sentences.sContent: The street lights were blurred by the fog.
sentences.sCn: 街灯在迷雾的笼罩下十分昏暗。

sentences.sContent: Many of the details in the picture are blurred.
sentences.sCn: 照片中的许多细节部分都模糊了。

synos.tran: 涂污；使…模糊不清；使暗淡；玷污

phrases.pCn: 运动模糊；动态模糊；动感模糊
高斯模糊（一种滤镜功能）

words.tran: 模糊的；污脏的；不清楚的
玷污；使…模糊不清；使感觉迟钝（blur的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 涂污；使…模糊不清；使暗淡；玷污
trans.tranOther: to become difficult to see, or to make something difficult to see, because the edges are not clear
a shape that you cannot see clearly
